errors.invalid_name_maxlength: Value passed for `name` exceeded max length.
errors.invalid_name_punctuation: Value passed for `name` contained only punctuation.
errors.invalid_name_specials: Value passed for `name` contained unallowed special characters or upper case characters.
errors.method_not_supported_for_channel_type: This type of conversation cannot be used with this method.
errors.missing_scope: The calling token is not granted the necessary scopes to complete this operation.
errors.not_in_channel: Caller is not a member of the channel.
